upload and download rate limit layout
Added download and upload  rate limit menu options

* Added set upload rate limit for torrents
* Added upload rate limit field in torrent's details

* Added infinity charater to upload and download rate limits (if apply)
* Fixed download rate limit TextView text in TorrentDetailsFragment

* Added setDownloadRateLimit to set download limit per torrent
* Fixed some timeout conditions
* Fixed query work flow. Now if it can't gell all the torrents information (list and info) then a network connection problem is reported
